conversation.thought:
I am Nursery_C, and my goal is to secure the highest ranked Parent possible within my quota of 1. My priority list is: Parent_B (1), Parent_A (2), Parent_D (3), Parent_E (4), Parent_C (5).
Parent_E (Rank 4) is applying for the second time, showing high commitment, and they are my only applicant in Round 2. I rejected them in Round 1 hoping for higher-ranked applicants (P_B, P_A, P_D).
None of my higher-ranked parents applied this round. Parent_B, my top choice, lists me as their 2nd preference, but likely targeted their 1st choice (Nursery_E) or another highly ranked nursery in R2.
If I reject Parent_E again, I risk losing them entirely, and based on the lack of applications from P_B, P_A, and P_D, it is uncertain if they will ever apply, especially since P_A and P_D rank me very low (4th and 5th respectively).
Securing a Rank 4 match now is better than risking being unmatched or forced to accept Rank 5 later. I will accept Parent_E.
